alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 1:05PM PST until January 05 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY UNTIL 4 PM WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Snow level will hover around 1500 feet tonight, then slowly rise to 2500 feet or higher on Wednesday. * WHERE...In Washington, South Washington Cascade Foothills. In Oregon, Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be challenging at times.
info.instruction: Drivers should be prepared for icy or snow covered roads and very dangerous winter like driving conditions. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
